name: Friend Zone 2: Pledge
description:
If you enjoyed the game, support it(and us) by rating and/or dropping comments! Each one of you counts!⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐ .................................. *Issues "playing in browser?" Try downloading it instead for smooth game-play.


After your boyfriends "accident" you find support within your friends as you enjoy the highs and lowers of your new club. 🥒Dress up your character 🥒Choose your who you spend your time with. 🥒Each scene has movement, bringing it to life for an eye-capturing experience. 🥒This is the second installment to "Friend Zone" a series of short stories with an expanding the universe. .................................................. other Friend Zone games: This game was made by me "MoonCaustics" (Artist/Editor) and "Beastcarving"(Coding/Writer/UI), check out our other projects!
